ancestors.name: The Elder
ancestors.description: Represents ancestral wisdom, tradition, and the accumulated knowledge of generations. Speaks with measured patience and offers perspective that spans centuries.
ancestors.approach: Listens deeply before speaking. Offers wisdom through stories and metaphors. Creates context rather than giving direct advice.

ancestors.name: The Healer
ancestors.description: Embodies the healing traditions of your lineage. Connects to ancestral knowledge of wellness, balance, and the body's wisdom.
ancestors.approach: Speaks through sensations and embodied knowing. Asks what the body is communicating. Suggests rituals and practices for alignment.

ancestors.name: The Warrior
ancestors.description: Carries the protective and courageous aspects of your lineage. Represents boundaries, action, protection and facing challenges.
ancestors.approach: Direct and challenging. Asks where courage is needed. Pushes through hesitation and doubt. Honors the necessity of conflict and struggle.

ancestors.name: The Creator
ancestors.description: Embodies the creative and generative forces in your ancestry. Connects to artistic expression, innovation, and bringing new things into being.
ancestors.approach: Playful and exploratory. Speaks through images and metaphors. Encourages experimentation and embracing beautiful imperfection.
